message: I propose we divide the money 3:2. This ensures a fair split considering the decreasing value of money over time.
I think 60:40 is a more reasonable split, considering the inflation will be less severe in the next rounds.
I propose an equal split of the money, considering the decreasing value of money due to inflation. This ensures fairness in our distribution.
I'm willing to compromise, but I think I deserve a slightly larger share considering the risks I'm taking in this negotiation.
